para.text: Computes the square root of an integral value.
This function calculates the square root of a given integral value using bit manipulation.

throws.text: if the input value is negative.

tparam.name: T
tparam.text: The type of the input value. Must be an integral type.

param.name: value
param.text: The integral value to compute the square root of.

returns.text: The square root of the input value.
